title: Hunting Chair
body: Designed in 1950 for the autumn exhibition of the Copenhagen Cabinetmakers’ Guild themed 'The Hunting Lodge', the Hunting Chair is one of Børge Mogensen’s unusual design. Made with solid oak frame and premium aniline leather for its seat and backrest, this Mobelaris style masterpiece is extremely well built and visually improve with age. This type of lounge chair will surely suit a room in your home and will be more than perfect with a pair.
